validateIntegration.success: Connected successfully. Found {{prompts}} prompts, {{resources}} resources, {{tools}} tools.

page.accessDeniedMessage: You need administrator privileges to access this page.
page.errorLoadingMessage: An error occurred while loading integrations

list.noIntegrationsMessage: Create your first integration to get started.

createCustomDialog.title: Add Custom Integration
createCustomDialog.description: Connect to a custom MCP server by providing its URL and authentication details.
createCustomDialog.name: Name
createCustomDialog.nameDescription: A friendly name for this integration
createCustomDialog.serverUrlDescription: The URL of your MCP server endpoint
createCustomDialog.authMethodDescription: Select an authentication method if required
createCustomDialog.headerNameDescription: The HTTP header name for authentication
createCustomDialog.noCredentialsRequired: This integration does not require additional credentials.

createPredefinedDialog.title: Add Predefined Integration
createPredefinedDialog.description: Select a predefined integration and configure authentication.
createPredefinedDialog.name: Name
createPredefinedDialog.nameDescription: A friendly name for this integration instance
createPredefinedDialog.headerNameDescription: The HTTP header name for authentication

editDialog.title: Edit Integration
editDialog.description: Update the name and authentication details for this integration.
editDialog.name: Name
editDialog.nameDescription: A friendly name for this integration
editDialog.headerNameDescription: The HTTP header name for authentication
editDialog.credentialsDescription: Enter new credentials or leave empty to keep existing ones
editDialog.noCredentialsMessage: This integration does not use authentication credentials.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Integration
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
